extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Admission restricted to third- or fourth-year students.

basic.description: This is the practical application of organizational behaviour knowledge to the effective and productive management of people at work. It provides a practical supplement to COMM-151*. The objective is to develop interpersonal skills crucial to the manager's role, including self-awareness, stress and time management, creativity and problem-solving, communications and public speaking, conflict management, influencing others, and the management of meetings.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Interpersonal Skills For Mgrs
